abstract: Mikaela Shiffrin wins slalom at United States Alpine Championships in Maine.
lead_paragraph: Shiffrin added another title to her collection, winning the slalom by a large margin at the United States Alpine Championships.

headline.main: Mikaela Shiffrin Easily Wins United States Slalom Title

snippet: Shiffrin added another title to her collection, winning the slalom by a large margin at the United States Alpine Championships.
